Package com.atakmap.net

Class AtakAuthenticationDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.net.AtakAuthenticationDatabase
  • public class AtakAuthenticationDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    The AtakAuthenticationDatabase provides a secure way of storing credentials (username/password). Credentials are stored and retrieved based on type, and optionally can be associated with a specific site. Credentials not associated with a specific site are referred to as 'default' credentials for that type.

        public static void setDeviceId​(java.lang.String id)
        Stores the devices unique ID, as determined by _determineBestDeviceUID.
        Parameters:

      • getPwd

        public static java.lang.String getPwd​(android.content.Context context,
                                      java.lang.String key,
                                      java.lang.String deviceId)
        Returns the password used to initialize the sqlcipher database. The password is derived from the passed in key and device id. Key is used to reference a UUID in the shared preferences. The password is sha256 hash of the key concatenated with the UUID.
        Parameters:
        context - A valid application context
        key - Used to lookup UUID in preferences
        deviceId - Unique identifier for this device
        Returns:
        void

      • initialize

        public static void initialize​(android.content.Context context)
        Called during application startup to initialize the underlying sqlcipher database. When called for the first time, the database will be created. Subsequent calls will open the database and delete any credentials which have expired.
        Parameters:
        context - A valid application context

      • dispose

        public static void dispose()
        Frees all runtime resources associated with the database. This function should be called when the application shuts down to ensure that the sqlcihper database is properly closed.

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Deletes the underlying sqlcipher database.

      • getDistinctSitesAndTypes

        public static AtakAuthenticationCredentials[] getDistinctSitesAndTypes()
        Returns the set of unique site/type pairs, as an array of credential objects with only the site & type populated.

        'default' credentials have type == site, and can be shared across sites and used when site specific credentials are not available. The AtakAuthenticationCredentials.isDefault method returns a boolean indicating if the credentials are defaults.

        Returns:
        AtakAuthenticationCredentials[]

      • getCredentials

        public static AtakAuthenticationCredentials getCredentials​(java.lang.String type,
                                                           java.lang.String site)
        Returns credentials for the given type/site pair.
        Parameters:
        type - Credential type per TYPE_ constants in AtakAuthenticationCredentials
        site - FQDN or IP associated with credentials
        Returns:
        AtakAuthenticationCredentials for the type and site or null if no credentials exist

      • getCredentials

        public static AtakAuthenticationCredentials getCredentials​(java.lang.String type)
        Returns the default credentials for the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - Credential type per TYPE_ constants in AtakAuthenticationCredentials
        Returns:
        AtakAuthenticationCredentials or null if no credentials exist

      • saveCredentials

        public static void saveCredentials​(java.lang.String type,
                                   java.lang.String site,
                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   long expires)
        Saves username and password credentials for the given type/site pair.
        Parameters:
        type - Credential type per TYPE_ constants in AtakAuthenticationCredentials
        site - FQDN or IP to associate credentials with
        username - the username to save
        password - the password to save
        expires - when this credential expires as a time in milliseconds since the current system time wehn the save command is invoked.

      • saveCredentials

        public static void saveCredentials​(java.lang.String type,
                                   java.lang.String site,
                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   boolean expires)
        Saves username and password credentials for the given type/site pair.
        Parameters:
        type - Credential type per TYPE_ constants in AtakAuthenticationCredentials
        site - FQDN or IP to associate credentials with
        username - the username to save
        password - the password to save
        expires - if true the expiration time is set to 30 days from the current system time from the time this method is called.

      • saveCredentials

        public static void saveCredentials​(java.lang.String type,
                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   long expires)
        Saves username and password as the default credentials for the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - Credential type per TYPE_ constants in AtakAuthenticationCredentials
        username - the username associated with the credential
        password - the password associated with the credential
        expires - when this credential expires as a time in milliseconds since the current system time wehn the save command is invoked.

      • saveCredentials

        public static void saveCredentials​(java.lang.String type,
                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   boolean expires)
        Saves username and password as the default credentials for the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - Credential type per TYPE_ constants in AtakAuthenticationCredentials
        username - the username associated with the credential
        password - the password associated with the credential
        expires - if true the expiration time is set to 30 days from the current system time from the time this method is called.

      • delete

                          java.lang.String site)
        Delete the credentials for the specified type and site.
        Parameters:

        site - FQDN or IP associated with credentials
